## Development setup

```bash
sudo apt-get --no-install-recommends install \
    autoconf \
    automake \
    clang \
    clang-format \
    clang-tools \
    llvm \
    llvm-dev \
    llvm-runtime \
    splint \
    pkg-config \
    python3-jedi \
    zlib1g-dev \
    valac \
    valgrind \
    cmake \
    vim-python-jedi \
    vim-nox
```
